title.rendered: Experience The Goodness And Power Of God By This Faith-Filled Book By Judy Rentz: Fighting To Survive

content.rendered:
Fighting to Survive: The Suicide Disease

A powerful testimony of a life-saving miracle.

TORONTO, ONTARIO, CANADA, May 3, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Laying in bed all day is one of the most preferred “activity” everyone would volunteer to do. However, when it is the only thing one can do for the rest of their life due to an illness hindering them to do other things, then anything else than being in bed is more desired.

Judy Rentz spent most of her days fighting for her life enduring the endless excruciating pain no one could ever imagine. She tried jumping from one appointment to another, hoping to find the solution to her nightmare that most doctors couldn’t even diagnose. As if carrying an insurmountable boulder, the weight of this unexplained illness torments her every single day.

Rentz published her book entitled “Fighting to Survive” after the Lord overcomes the impossible for her. In awe of God’s goodness and power, she pens the most inspiring and faith-filled book she has ever written.

Returning the grace God has given her, Judy Rentz tells the world of the hope He has given her by writing the book “Fighting to Survive” for everyone who is in search of help, advocating that there is a chance and that all it requires is faith in God.

Feeling helpless or know someone who needs to hear the good news? Get a chance to immerse in this extraordinary book, available now on Amazon and other leading digital bookstores.

About Bookside Press:

Bringing stories and ideas to life, one tap at a time.

Bookside Press is all about creating buzz in the digital world. Buzz that’ll have each vital message be heard loud and clear. Headquartered in Canada, this hybrid publishing and advertising company aims to share the magic of its authors’ books with the world. With a dedicated team of creatives and marketing professionals, Bookside Press collaborates with clients in building better brands that stand out and reach greater heights.

EMMANUEL LAGUARDIA
